name: Atlas
description:
As the largest Direct Employer of Record (EOR), Atlas is an expertise-enabled technology platform that delivers flexibility for companies to expand across borders, onboard talent, manage compliance, and pay their global workforce without the need for a local entity or multiple third-party providers. 

With entities in over 160 countries, Atlas brings localized experience & expertise into an enterprise-grade technology platform that supports thousands of companies and remote teams.
features: Hire and pay talent without borders.
Manage the employee lifecycle from onboarding to payroll.
Cut through the red tape of global compliance.
Headline: Guides companies on their  journeys with solutions that enable talent management.
ShortDescription: Atlas enables innovative companies to compete in a global economy, believing that businesses should employ whomever they want, wherever the talent exists.

Highlights.name: Global Talent, Simplified
Highlights.description: AtlasHXM's platform streamlines hiring and managing staff, allowing businesses to focus on growth without the complexities of international employment regulations.

Highlights.name: Compliance Confidence
Highlights.description: AtlasHXM acts as the Employer of Record (EOR), taking on legal and administrative responsibilities for you. This frees your company from managing payroll, taxes, and other HR burdens in each location.

Highlights.name: Build Borderless Teams
Highlights.description: AtlasHXM provides a user-friendly platform for onboarding, managing, and paying your international talent. This empowers businesses to quickly build and scale remote teams with top performers.

enhanced_description: Atlas is positioned as the largest Direct Employer of Record (EOR), offering an expertise-enabled technology platform designed to provide companies with the flexibility needed for international expansion. It streamlines the process of expanding across borders, onboarding talent, managing compliance, and paying a global workforce, eliminating the need for a local entity or multiple third-party providers. Operating with entities in over 160 countries, Atlas integrates localized experience and expertise into an enterprise-grade technology platform that supports thousands of companies and remote teams. The platform simplifies global talent management, from hiring and onboarding to payroll, by acting as the EOR, thereby taking on legal and administrative responsibilities and freeing companies from managing international employment complexities, taxes, and other HR burdens in various locations. This empowers businesses to efficiently build and scale remote teams with top global performers.
